title: How Tough Fasting was before the Quran gave its Details - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: and there's a Hadith which is mentioned in say bukari book of fasting Hadith number 1915 where it mentions about a sahaba by the name of Al and he comes one day to the house at the time ofar after doing a lot of hard work and he tells his wife that I'm hungry please can I have some food forar so the wife says there's no food in the house I will go and get from outside so when she goes out to get food because this sahab pleas with him he was very tired so by the time the wife comes back and she sees the husband sleeping she says oh what a disappointment now we can't have the meal so when he gets up next day he could not have the food and he had to fast the whole next day and by the time evening comes he faints so they took the matter to the prophet and told him what had happened and after that the verse of the Quran Surah Bak chapter number two verse number 187 was revealed that you can approach your wife and eat and drink until the white thread of dawn is differentiated from the black thread so then were the rules laid down that means you could eat the full night and then the veres again fast till the night falls me to Sunset and that's what we follow today
